questions.text: PLEASE INTRODUCE YOURSELF AND TELL US ABOUT YOURSELF
Your thoughts on women empowerment.
The city that you live in: 2 places to visit and 2 places not to visit, and why.
The city that you live in: 2 things you like and 2 things you don't, and why.
If you were a leader at your company, what changes would you like to bring in?
What's your daily routine?
What are your thoughts on life without technology?
What's your take on AI?
Out of WFH, WFO, and hybrid, which work model do you personally prefer and why?
A profitable mistake that you ever made and you felt great/bad about it.
Describe your worst/good experience in your previous organization.
Easy ways to become a millionaire.
Does money change people?
Positives of social media.
Laughter is the best medicine.
If you could time travel, what would you like to experience?
Real learnings occur outside the classroom.
Ways to overcome phobias/fear.
Do we have to lie sometimes? If yes/no, why?
Do colors affect the way people feel?
Children become their environment.
How would you describe yourself as a person?
What are your strengths and areas of opportunity?
What motivates you and why?
What are your views on stress and how do you handle stress?
How would your friends describe you?
Could you describe one of your typical workdays?
What are your short-term career goals and long-term goals?
Talk about an experience handling difficult customers.
What do you think of customer service and its importance? Share one difficult customer case you handled.
Any technology that you want to learn and why you want to learn it.
If you get an opportunity to change your career, which career would you choose and why?

Complete the sentence by narrating an incident or imaginary story. Choose one: Last evening I was playing with my pet and suddenly I saw... / Last evening while I was returning home, I suddenly saw... / I was having coffee at my home and suddenly there was a knock on the door and... / My friend and I were strolling in the park and I noticed...
Why do you want to join us?
Tell me about a unique strength you have / what sets you apart from others / one area of improvement you want to work on.
Tell us about your past work experience and any tools or software you are proficient with. Provide as much detail as possible.
Please detail the extent of your Customer Service / VA experience.
Are you interested in full-time employment, part-time, or either?
What are your salary requirements? Please specify a number and the currency (USD, PHP, etc.).
Describe a time when a client approached you with a problem they couldn't solve. What did you do?
How do you keep yourself motivated and how do you update yourself with the latest technologies?
